Package com.atakmap.android.update

Class FileSystemProductProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.update.BaseProductProvider
      • com.atakmap.android.update.FileSystemProductProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductProviderManager.Provider, Disposable
    public class FileSystemProductProvider
extends BaseProductProvider
    Provides custom filesystem based repo Does not use the IO Abstraction for plugin installation Repo index stored at: atak/support/apks/custom/product.inf Based on settings, can load APKs from any directory but product.inf still lives here

    First look for product.inf, then product.infz If neither found, then attempt to build product.inf from available APK files

      • getAPK

        protected java.io.File getAPK​(ProductInformation product)
        Description copied from class: BaseProductProvider
        Runs on UI thread, must be quick (i.e. file already on filesystem). If long running, then implementations should override install() and getAPK() to offline to background thread
        Specified by:
        getAPK in class BaseProductProvider
        Parameters:
        product - the product information
        Returns:
        the apk associated with the product information
